name: Promevo
description:
Since 2001, Promevo has provided messaging and collaboration solutions to organizations of all sizes, with a particular focus on customers with complex environments exceeding 10,000 users. With offices in Cincinnati, OH, Louisville, KY and Atlanta, GA, we provide Google Apps, Postini, Google Vault, Google Drive, and Chrome Device products, consulting services & solutions to customers worldwide.
As Premier Google Apps Resellers & Certified Google Chromebook Resellers, we employ a knowledgeable staff of Google Apps Certified Deployment Specialists and Google Apps Certified Sales Specialists. Our business is 100% dedicated to Google Apps technology.
READ MORE...
